reviews.review_msg: Favourite prof ever. Super helpful and available for assignments, hilarious classes, challenges us without making us want to die.

What I like about Neven is his teaching style. He presents the material as no textbook would, from a weird perspective - yet he backs it up brilliantly. The Google Earth is great tool to effortlessly absorb geography. Neven seems to truly care about his career and students. I took some notes for my future teaching career from him ; )
Amazing!!! love this class because of the professor.
